name: Captain Drae and the Lost Artifacts
name_original: Captain Drae and the Lost Artifacts
description:
Captain Drae always loves when missions take them to Earth, but this time is a special case: Drae's been tasked with gathering old technology that was forgotten by their species, but not by humans! Recover these items so scientists back on the homeworld can reverse-engineer them and restore part of Drae's people's history!

Controls: Use Arrow keys / WASD keys to move.

Created for Weekly Game Jam #70 - Ancient Technology

Made in Bitsy, which is created by Adam LeDoux

Special thanks to Ayolland's Borksy Game Hacker and mildmojo's Exit From Dialog mod!
